page.title: 03Wareham Arts & Crafts Con'td
page.content: {The Peter Hedly Art Gallery.(Paintings {only). Wareham is a Profitable Outlet because of tourists travelling to and from the Isle of Purbeck.70% of sales are the work of artists outside Dorset.50% of sales are to impulse buyers.This shows the importance of the tourist trade to the shopkeeper that does not have a local trade. Mr.Headly agrees with Mr.Chaffy in saying that local scenes sell well to tourists{Sibley Pottery. Sibley pottery has a restaurant and a pottery shop.They sell slip cast and hand thrown pottery it is no longer made on the premises.Tourism is vital to trade.Their peak time is Summer Holidays.Their restaurant receives more money than the shop. Pottery is expensive due to lack of trade.
